title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS Did you see my mushroom enchilada casserole? I have yet to try this baking soda trick for ground beef. Americans are drinking less. I know I am. Let’s pause life and look at funny memes. People whose names became adjectives. Portraits of dogs with their fave things. Matt! look! Mom loved a good fart walk. Lol Gloria Vanderbilt had amazing decorating skills. Are Twizzlers licorice? Perfectly timed/framed photos. Nature reclaims civilization. I love optical poems! Wow. The lost art of the Hollywood Kaleidoscope. What’s the difference between FDA and USDA? A home in Palm Springs for the pink lover! It never occurred to me to grow strawberries inside. This is what 5 megs of data looked like in 1966. I want a heart shaped plant. I have been curating this planner pinterest board! This nudge counter looks like it would be fun to use. Take a look inside my hobonichi cousin from 2024. The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
text: SEARCH THE ARCHIVES SEARCH THE ARCHIVES
